title: Making a high school LoL club?

replies.body:
Hey Summoner,

I don't know how your high school works so I can't give specific advice, but here are a few people you can ask about starting a club or a tournament:

+ Your Homeroom teacher (known as "form class" teacher in my school)


+ Your Student Council president or Head Student (these guys are usually the kids who give speeches frequently at assemblies)


+ Your ICT teacher

Otherwise, just ask literally any teacher if they know how to start a club at your school :)

__*

I wouldn't worry about hosting tournaments just now BTW. You main focus should be to set up the club with the help of whoever manages the PCs (usually the ICT teacher), and think about what the club will actually do. 

_Are you going to play a game of League during lunch?_
_Are you going to play custom games/1v1s?_
_Are you going to practice strategies and mechanics?_
_Are you going to just have a cool place where people who enjoy League can chill out at lunch?_

Also if you're worried about low attendance, you might want to start a general gaming club first and **make sure you get an announcement in your school notices or at assembly!**

Good luck man!

Oh! I forgot you might find [this site](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/high-school-clubs/teacher-resource.html) is super useful too.

It has resources for you to make fliers and additional information on setting up a club, and it's got 'teacher stuff' about sportsmanship to convince them that a League club is a good idea :D

Hey Xzoo

You've received some great advice from Tele.  

I'm also happy to speak to Teachers in your school to explain the purpose and benefits of a High School LoL Club.  You can ask them to contact me at OCE-Highschool@riotgames.com 

Best regards
Conquisitor
Your Teachers can contact me at OCE-Highschool@riotgames.com
